Introduction
This topic contains information about evaluating competency in special circumstances, including
decree by a court as notice and hearing
evaluating competency when the beneficiary is found incompetent by court decree
procedures following receipt of court decree restoring competency
authorization actions when reinstating benefits for a beneficiary previously rated incompetent
rating actions when reinstating benefits for a beneficiary previously rated incompetent
, and
referral to a hub after reinstating benefits for a beneficiary with a continued finding of incompetency
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section A - Evaluating and Rating Competency
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section A
